title: What will National Guard troops do on Trump's DC deployment?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump deployed 800 National Guard troops to Washington, D.C.

title: Trump's new DC police boss: Terry Cole also leads the DEA
shortDescription: Trump tapped Terrance Cole as part of an extraordinary takeover of the Washington Metropolitan Police Department.

title: Is DC unsafe, as Trump claims? What the crime data shows
shortDescription: In Washington, crime is relatively high, but far from the highest in the country, and it has been on a downward trend.

title: DC residents push back on Trump orders
shortDescription: Washington D.C. residents and activists protested President Donald Trump taking federal control over police and National Guard deployment.

title: Smithsonian adds Trump back to impeachment display with some changes
shortDescription: The National Museum of American History removed references to Donald Trump from an impeachment display in July. He has since been re-added, with some changes.

title: President Trump blasts DC crime before Putin trip
shortDescription: President Donald Trump slammed Washington D.C. crime as ‘embarrassing’ before meeting with Russia's president, vowing National Guard deployment.

title: Trump pushes Zelenskyy to agree to 'land swap' with Russia
shortDescription: Trump said he was bothered by Volodymyr Zelenskyy's response that it would violate Ukraine's constitution to cede territory to Russia in a land swap.

title: Donald Trump takes over DC police: 5 takeaways
shortDescription: President Trump painted a dark picture of crime in the nation's capitol as he uses his executive authority to seize the city's police force

title: Trump White House moves Obama portrait away from public view
shortDescription: The White House Historical Association has acquired and commissioned official portraits of the president and first lady since 1965.

title: Trump declares DC public safety emergency
shortDescription: President Donald Trump invoked Home Rule Act to take control of DC police amid his crime concerns.

title: President, police chief, social worker: Trump a man of many hats
shortDescription: With a move to take over law enforcement in Washington, D.C., Trump also vows to clear away the homeless and pave the potholes.

title: Trump issues stern warning to protesters: 'You spit and we hit'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued a stern warning to protesters in Washington, DC during his Aug. 11 press briefing: "You spit and we hit."

title: Trump puts other US cities on notice as he sends National Guard to DC
shortDescription: President Trump mentioned New York, Baltimore, Chicago and other cities as places where he may deploy the National Guard to crack down on crime.

title: See inside the briefing room as Trump announces takeover of D.C.
shortDescription: Trump announced he will place the DC Metropolitan Police Department under federal control and deploy National Guard troops to the nation's capital.

title: Did Trump fall? No, not recently. X has fake AI photos, fake Grok video
shortDescription: There are images and videos circulating on social media, especially on X, that show Donald Trump has fallen or crawling in the grass. They are fake.

title: Trump considering reclassifying marijuana. What is THC?
shortDescription: No judgment here — we're answering your burning questions about THC.

title: Trump administration is looking at reclassifying marijuana
shortDescription: In 2024, DEA proposed a rule to transfer marijuana to Schedule III. That rule change has been on hold since March 2025.

title: Trump deploys National Guard to DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced he is taking control of the Washington, D.C. police and deploying the National Guard.

title: See the increased federal law enforcement presence in Washington D.C.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump ordered an increased federal law enforcement presence across the streets of Washington, D.C.

title: Live coverage: Trump orders National Guard into Washington, DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the federal government will take control of the Washington, D.C., Metropolitan Police Department.

title: What time is Trump speaking today? Watch live remarks on crime in D.C.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is expected to speak on crime in Washington, D.C. on Monday Aug. 11 at 10 a.m. eastern. Watch the press conference.

title: Got 'range anxiety'? Trump halts massive EV charger project
shortDescription: Many would-be EV purchasers have cited what's known as 'range anxiety' in their reluctance to switch over from a gas car.

title: 450 federal officers deployed to patrol DC streets ahead of Trump announcement
shortDescription: The White House said 450 officers from multiple federal agencies, including the FBI, were deployed in the nation's capital on Aug. 9 and Aug. 10.

title: Trump's former surgeon general slams RFK Jr.'s vaccine cuts
shortDescription: "People are going to die because we're cutting short funding for this technology," Dr. Jerome Adams said in an interview with CBS News on Aug. 10.

title: Trump says homeless people in DC 'have to move out IMMEDIATELY''
shortDescription: Trump says he plans to make an announcement Aug. 11 about a D.C. crime initiative, even as violent crime is down significantly in the nation's capital.
